job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>We’re hiring for a rapidly growing series A startup, who are developing an autonomous vehicle using “shared autonomy”. The company’s platform combines robotics, computer vision and machine learning and it’s here to revolutionize their $12 billion market.</p><p><br></p><p>They’re looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to design and deliver their new autonomous vehicle.</p><p><br></p><p>If you are passionate about cutting edge machine learning, robotics and having real-world impact – this could be the place for you!</p><p><br></p><p>You will:</p><ul><li>Design and train neural networks</li><li>Design, train and verify robust machine learning systems</li><li>Provide technical leadership</li><li>Write maintainable code, design software and deploy machine learning models</li><li>Collaborate with other members of the team</li></ul><p><br></p><p>You have:</p><ul><li>PhD or Master’s degree in Computer Science or related field</li><li>Experience in reinforcement learning, machine learning or optimization theory</li><li>3+ years of hands-on experience</li><li>Expertise with deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, Tensorflow, Keras)</li><li>Experience developing machine learning systems</li><li>Expertise in Python and C++</li><li>Excellent communication skills</li></ul><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><em>Big Cloud is acting as a vendor to this position which is a direct hire.</em></p>
